title: Anthology Jolie Reversible Comforter Set at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Transform your bedroom into an exotic retreat with the Anthology Jolie Reversible Comforter Set. The Bohemian chic comforter features a Moroccan-inspired Ikat print in tranquil shades of blue on one side and reverses to a complementary stripe. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/anthology-trade-jolie-reversible-comforter-set-in-blue/212240? 
Transform your bedroom into an exotic retreat with the Anthology Jolie Reversible Comforter Set. The Bohemian chic comforter features a Moroccan-inspired Ikat print in tranquil shades of blue on one side and reverses to a complementary stripe. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts:
The Jolie Comforter and Bedding Collection by Anthology was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the  bed begins with the euro shams. The euro shams add an ideal backdrop to the bed. They have an applique, straight ribbon detail, and are 100% cotton. 

The Jolie Comforter and Pillow Shams are 100% cotton with an ikat printed, sold as a set. The coordinating pillow shams and comforter are finished with the same mint, navy, and gray print. The resulting bed is cool, yet comfortable. 

The pillows accenting this bed suite are a square folded felt pillow in gray, an oblong pillow with a white background in embroidery in tones of blue, and a square white pillow with delicate blue French knots. The pillows add the key fashion elements to complete this bed look. The Jolie Comforter and Bedding Collection is part of the Anthology Collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
